name: Diplomatic
description: Government is considered to be diplomatic and +1 for diplomacy.

name: Friendly
description: Ruler is friendly and +1 for diplomacy.

name: Mercantile
description: Trading creates extra credit

name: Business oriented
description: Trading creates two extra credits

name: Industrial
description: Extra production when planet has 4 or more population.

name: Mining oriented
description: Extra metal when planet has 4 or more population.

name: Research oriented
description: Extra research point when planet has 4 or more population.

name: Technology focused
description: Two extra research points when planet has 4 or more population.

name: War happy
description: One extra happiness if realm is in war.

name: Single mind
description: No effects from happiness.

name: Population rush
description: Rush projects with population.

name: Credit rush
description: Rush projects with credit.

name: Armed freighter
description: Single weapon is allowed in freighter. Other realm still consideres them as unarmed.

name: Xeno phobic
description: Deny hiring leaders from other realms. No other space race can be the ruler.

name: Governor happiness
description: Governor on planet automatically gives extra happiness.

name: Reign period short
description: Ruler is in reign 20 star years.

name: Reign period long
description: Ruler is in reign 60 star years.

name: Reign period life time
description: Ruler is in reign for a life.

name: Happy population
description: Population are generally happy with government.

name: Unhappy population
description: Population are generally unhappy with government.

name: Extra happy population
description: Population are generally really happy with government.

name: Weakness for war
description: War causes unhappiness much faster.

name: Tolerant for war
description: Single war does not cause unhappiness.

name: Endure war
description: Two wars does not cause unhappiness.
